Label.en: After all, there's much more that goes intro the construction of a building like the Eiffel Tower than just design... as we'll soon see!
Label.fr: Pour mener à bien la construction d'un tel bâtiment, nous allons voir qu'une conception innovante ne suffit pas !
Label.es: After all, there's much more that goes intro the construction of a building like the Eiffel Tower than just design... as we'll soon see!
Label.zh: After all, there's much more that goes intro the construction of a building like the Eiffel Tower than just design... as we'll soon see!

Label.en: So... not only was there the chance that the Eiffel tower could have been called something different... but also that it could have been in a different city!
Label.fr: Non seulement la tour Eiffel aurait pu s'appeler autrement, mais elle aurait pu être erigée ailleurs !
Label.es: So... not only was there the chance that the Eiffel tower could have been called something different... but also that it could have been in a different city!
Label.zh: So... not only was there the chance that the Eiffel tower could have been called something different... but also that it could have been in a different city!

Label.en: The project was originally offered to Barcelona!
Label.fr: A l'origine, le projet a été proposé à la ville de Barcelone !
Label.es: The project was originally offered to Barcelona!
Label.zh: The project was originally offered to Barcelona!

Label.en: Once the designs and plans and price had all been figured out, Eiffel pitched the project to the government of Barcelona
Label.fr: Après en avoir déterminé les plans et le coût, Eiffel a proposé la tour au maire de Barcelone, pour son exposition universelle de 1888
Label.es: Once the designs and plans and price had all been figured out, Eiffel pitched the project to the government of Barcelona
Label.zh: Once the designs and plans and price had all been figured out, Eiffel pitched the project to the government of Barcelona

Label.en: Once the designs and plans and price had all been figured out, Eiffel pitched the project to the government of Barcelona
Label.fr: Après en avoir déterminé les plans et le coût, Eiffel a proposé la tour au maire de Barcelone, pour son exposition universelle de 1888
Label.es: Once the designs and plans and price had all been figured out, Eiffel pitched the project to the government of Barcelona
